name: Bionic SaaS
description:
Embark on this perilous adventure with a clear goal in mind: to end an ancient war between two cosmic entities that shattered the whole universe's balance, The Supreme Roosters' War; a face-off between the merciless Galo de Kalsa and the unscrupulous Galo de Tênis.

Our youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGdOBHR1DHOyzLTKBt0DQng/
